block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: The last bird was a crow, this one is a raven. How do you tell the difference between a crow and a raven? Learn How to fold this Origami Raven designed by Tavin and Paper Crafts 1101. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Tavin & Paper Crafts 1101
